verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) Do not <S%H2734>fret<s%> because of <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> Be not <S%H7065>envious<s%> toward <S%H9390>wrongdoers.<s%>
For they will <S%H9268>wither<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%> like the <S%H2682>grass,<s%> And <S%H5034>fade<s%> like the <S%H3418>green<s%> <S%H1877>herb.<s%>
<S%H982>Trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H9185>good;<s%> <S%H7931>Dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> and <S%H9565>cultivate<s%> <S%H530>faithfulness.<s%>
<S%H6026>Delight<s%> yourself in the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> And He will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H4862>desires<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H1556>Commit<s%> your <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H982>Trust<s%> also in Him, and He will <S%H6213>do<s%> it.
And He will <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> your <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> as the <S%H216>light,<s%> And your <S%H4941>judgment<s%> as the <S%H6672>noonday.<s%>

<S%H1826>Rest<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H9123>wait<s%> <S%H9123>patiently<s%> for Him; Do not <S%H2734>fret<s%> because of him who <S%H6743>prospers<s%> in his <S%H1870>way,<s%> Because of the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H6213>carries<s%> out <S%H4209>wicked<s%> <S%H4209>schemes.<s%>
<S%H7503>Cease<s%> from <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H2534>wrath;<s%> Do not <S%H2734>fret,<s%> [it leads] <S%H389>only<s%> to <S%H7489>evildoing.<s%>
For <S%H7489>evildoers<s%> will be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off,<s%> But those who <S%H6960>wait<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> they will <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H5750>Yet<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4592>while<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> will be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>more;<s%> And you will <S%H995>look<s%> <S%H995>carefully<s%> for his <S%H4725>place,<s%> and he will not be [there.]
But the <S%H6035>humble<s%> will <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> And will <S%H6026>delight<s%> themselves in <S%H7230>abundant<s%> <S%H7965>prosperity.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2161>plots<s%> against the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> And <S%H2786>gnashes<s%> at him with his <S%H8127>teeth.<s%>
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H7832>laughs<s%> at him; For He <S%H7200>sees<s%> his <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H935>coming.<s%>

The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have <S%H6605>drawn<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H1869>bent<s%> their <S%H7198>bow,<s%> To <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and the <S%H34>needy,<s%> To <S%H2873>slay<s%> those <S%H3477>who<s%> are <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H1870>conduct.<s%>
Their <S%H2719>sword<s%> will <S%H935>enter<s%> their own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> And their <S%H7198>bows<s%> will be <S%H7665>broken.<s%>
<S%H2896>Better<s%> is the <S%H4592>little<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> the <S%H1995>abundance<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
For the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will be <S%H7665>broken;<s%> But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5564>sustains<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8549>blameless;<s%> And their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> will be <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
They will not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H9567>evil;<s%> And in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7459>famine<s%> they will <S%H7646>have<s%> <S%H7646>abundance.<s%>

But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will perish; And the <S%H6>enemies<s%> of the <S%H340>Lord<s%> will be like the <S%H3068>glory<s%> of the <S%H3368>pastures,<s%> They <S%H9221>vanish<s%> â€“ like <S%H3615>smoke<s%> they <S%H6227>vanish<s%> away.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H9233>borrows<s%> and does not <S%H9608>pay<s%> <S%H9608>back,<s%> But the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is <S%H2603>gracious<s%> and <S%H5414>gives.<s%>
For those <S%H1288>blessed<s%> by Him will <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%> But those <S%H7043>cursed<s%> by Him will be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off.<s%>
The <S%H4703>steps<s%> of a <S%H1397>man<s%> are <S%H3559>established<s%> by the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> And He <S%H2654>delights<s%> in his <S%H1870>way.<s%>
<S%H3588>When<s%> he <S%H5307>falls,<s%> he shall not be <S%H2904>hurled<s%> <S%H2904>headlong;<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the One who <S%H5564>holds<s%> his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

I have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H5288>young,<s%> and <S%H1571>now<s%> I am <S%H2204>old;<s%> Yet I have not <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken,<s%> Or his <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H1245>begging<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long he is <S%H2603>gracious<s%> and <S%H9233>lends;<s%> And his <S%H2233>descendants<s%> are a <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>
<S%H5493>Depart<s%> from <S%H9563>evil,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H9185>good,<s%> So you will <S%H7931>abide<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H4941>justice,<s%> And does not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> His <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones;<s%> They are <S%H8104>preserved<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> But the <S%H2233>descendants<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> And <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in it <S%H5703>forever.<s%>
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1897>utters<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> And his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H4941>justice.<s%>
The <S%H8451>law<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%> is in his <S%H3820>heart;<s%> His <S%H9036>steps<s%> do not <S%H4571>slip.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6822>spies<s%> upon the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> And <S%H1245>seeks<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> him.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> him in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> Or let him be <S%H7561>condemned<s%> when he is <S%H8199>judged.<s%>

<S%H6960>Wait<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H1870>way,<s%> And He will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> you to <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%> When the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off,<s%> you will <S%H7200>see<s%> it.
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> a <S%H6184>violent,<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> <S%H6168>Spreading<s%> himself like a <S%H7488>luxuriant<s%> <S%H249>tree<s%> in its <S%H249>native<s%> soil.
Then he <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>away,<s%> and <S%H2009>lo,<s%> he was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>more;<s%> I <S%H1245>sought<s%> for him, but he could not be <S%H4672>found.<s%>
<S%H8104>Mark<s%> the <S%H8535>blameless<s%> <S%H8535>man,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H3477>upright;<s%> For the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> will have a <S%H319>posterity.<s%>
But <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> will be <S%H9191>altogether<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed;<s%> The <S%H319>posterity<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off.<s%>
But the <S%H8668>salvation<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is from the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> He is their <S%H4581>strength<s%> in <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5826>helps<s%> them, and <S%H6403>delivers<s%> them; He <S%H6403>delivers<s%> them from the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and <S%H3467>saves<s%> them, <S%H3588>Because<s%> they <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in Him.
